shows.title: Police Cops in Space
shows.desc:
In this ‘80s low-fi sci-fi’, Sammy Johnson embarks on an intergalactic adventure with an alien fighter pilot and his trusty cyborg. He must find Earth, avenge the death of his father and become the best damn Police Cop in space!

Age Recommendation: 12+
Run Time: 60 minutes

Police Cops are Nathan Parkinson, Zachary Hunt and Tom Roe, a multi award-winning, globally acclaimed comedy company based in London.
